title: In conversation with NASA astronaut Rex Walheim
brief_description: To top off a decade-long career at NASA, Rex Walheim was in the final shuttle mission for NASA’s 30 year space program. He provides a detailed account of NASA’s space program and space exploration moving forward, as well as the achievements of the past. He also looks at his own path to becoming an astronaut, the experience of space travel and how to do a space walk.
